text: mariyu variki ihaloka jivitanni i upamanam dvara bodhincu: Memu akasam nundi nitini kuripincinapudu, danini bhumiloni cettu cemalu pilcukoni (paccaga perugutayi). A taruvata avi endi pottuga maripoyinapudu, gali vatini cellaceduru cestundi. Mariyu vastavaniki allah ye pratidi ceyagala samardhudu
